page.title: 13WORK IN MENZIESHILL,DUNDEE.
page.content: Employment in our area is very good. We have a{Community Centre}which employs 63 staff, 7 of which are full_time. In 1984 they had a turnover of Â£28,532. We have a number of big stores in our area i.e.{Queensway} which employs 16 people,has 2 computers and has an average turnover of about Â£187,500;{Roselodge }which employs 21 people and has an average turnover of about Â£75,000;also a large D.I.Y. Superstore. There are also 2 schools- {Gowriehill }and{Charleston. In 1984/85 Gowriehill had 29 staff and 265 pupils. It also had a special class for slow learners. Charleston had 18 staff and 278 pupils.
